com.github.mrivanplays.event

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrivanplays.event.EventManager

  • public final class EventManager
extends Object
    Represents a manager, which function is to manage events.

      EventManager()

        public EventManager()

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public <T extends Event> void registerListener(Class<T> eventClass,
                                               EventExecutor<T> eventExecutor)
        Registers a listener to the specified event class. It is strongly recommended to use EventExecutorBuilder to create your listener
        Type Parameters:
        T - event
        Parameters:
        eventClass - the event class you wish to register a listener to
        eventExecutor - the listener you want to register

      • unregisterListener

        public <T extends Event> void unregisterListener(Class<T> eventClass,
                                                 EventExecutor<T> eventExecutor)
        Unregisters a listener from the specified event class. It is strongly recommended to use EventExecutorBuilder to recreate the listener you wish to unregister
        Type Parameters:
        T - event
        Parameters:
        eventClass - the event class you wish to unregister a listener from
        eventExecutor - the listener you want to unregister

      • unregisterListeners

        public void unregisterListeners(EventListener owner)
        Unregisters all registered listeners which owner is the specified owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of who you want to unregister the listeners from

      • callEvent

        public <T extends Event> CompletableFuture<T> callEvent(T event)
        Calls the specified event if the specified event has registered listeners.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type
        Parameters:
        event - the event you wish to call
        Returns:
        completable future

      • callEventSuccess

        public <T extends Event> boolean callEventSuccess(T event)
        Calls the specified event which return state is the event call success.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type
        Parameters:
        event - the event you wish to call
        Returns:
        success state of the called event
        See Also:
        callEvent(Event)

      • getExecutors

        public <T extends Event> Collection<EventExecutor<T>> getExecutors(Class<T> eventClass)
        Gets all the listeners of the specified event
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type
        Parameters:
        eventClass - the event class of which you want to get the listeners of
        Returns:
        a collection of listeners if have, else empty list
